name: Human
description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races.

traits.name: Versatile
entries: Humans gain an additional skill proficiency, an additional language, and a feat at 1st level.

name: Elf
description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in places of ethereal beauty.

traits.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency with the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
entries: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

name: Dwarf
description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
entries: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

traits.name: Stonecunning
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

name: Halfling
description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice or finding ways to travel.

traits.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

name: Dragonborn
description: Born of dragons, as their name proclaims, the dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
entries: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
entries: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy based on your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
entries: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.
